name: Bouncebot
description:
Control Blip the Bouncebot as you bounce and bop your way along in this casual endless runner game.

Guaranteed frustratingly fun!

Guide Blip along the never ending track of random obstacles. Test your skills of timing and focus as the speed steadily increases. Jump and duck while matching the correct shape and height to avoid destruction.

Compete against your friends' top scores, or share your best attempt!

WARNING! Contains a minimal banner ad so just skip to free download, though donations still appreciated:)

Apk download only for now, I will add a playable html version if it works.
